channel.description: Recent content in OMP on Particl Project Wiki

item.title: Open Market Protocol (OMP)
item.description: Design Extensibility Privacy Portability It is a standardized and open format containing most of the economic interactions of an online marketplace. The OMP is available as an open-source protocol on Particl’s Github page and is licensed under the terms of the MIT license. Read Open Market Protocol documentation for in-depth info. Design The Open Market Protocol is divided into two distinct formats.
